features.title: Darkfield Laser Tracking
features.description: The world is your mouse pad. Enjoy smooth accurate cursor control in places where optical and standard laser mice fail, like glass desks (4 mm minimum thickness) and other high-gloss surfaces.

features.title: Hyper-Fast scrolling
features.description: Fly through long documents and Web pages with a flick of the nearly frictionless scroll wheel. Or shift to click-to-click mode for precise, line-by-line navigation of lists, slides and images.
